name: SoundOasisTherapy
0:
”Alexa, open sound oasis therapy”
”Alexa, ask sound oasis therapy for a list of sounds”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sound oasis therapy
des:
Sleep Therapy Sounds
By Sound Oasis

These calming sounds help you fall asleep easier and get higher quality sleep, but they are also great for meditation, relaxation, tinnitus management and blocking out distracting noises.

HOW TO USE:
Start by saying "Alexa, open/launch Sound Oasis Therapy" and Alexa will ask you what sound you would like to hear. If you use a device with a display, you can simply tap on the display to open the sound page with a description and then navigate with the Play and Return buttons. 
To start a sound immediately or to change sounds while a sound is playing, just say "Alexa, play Ocean Surf” or another sound of choice. Say "Alexa, play next/previous" to play the next or previous sound on the list. To play a random sound, say "Alexa, play random".
For a full list of available sounds, say "Alexa, show/tell me a list of sounds”. To listen to the sound’s description, say "Alexa, tell me about Ocean Surf".
By default, Sleep Therapy Sounds will play your selected sound until you say "Alexa, stop/pause", but you can set a custom timer by saying "Alexa, play Ocean Surf for 5 hours and 30 minutes" or any other time duration.
Each Sound Oasis sound track is 8 hours long, but you can ask Alexa to play your chosen sound for as long as you like.
To sleep play without any skill notification, say "Alexa, going to sleep play Ocean Surf or another sound of choice. Commands "I woke up" or "I am awake" will turn off sleep mode.
Say "Alexa, help" to explore all available voice commands that work on all devices.

SOUNDS INCLUDED IN SLEEP THERAPY SOUNDS
1. Niagara Falls
2. Brown Noise
3. Grey Noise
4. Pink Noise
5. Rain with White Noise
6. Ocean Surf with White Noise
7. Jet Interior with White Noise
8. White Stream
9. Steady Rain
10. Thunderstorm 
12. Summer Night
13. Cricket Chorus
14. Ocean Surf
15. White Rain
16. Jungle Stream
17. Forest Rain
18. Thunder and Rain
20. Tropical Rain
21. Secluded Lake
22. Gentle Rain
23. Rainforest
24. Asian Garden
25. Yoga Relax

Disclaimer
The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.

SOUND REQUESTS:
We record many of sounds in the wild then carefully edit them for maximum effectiveness. If you would like new sounds added to this list, please e-mail us at customerservice@soundoasis.com
